name: FoldWalker
description:
FoldWalker is a 3D File Explorer that turns your computer into a world to explore!

Discover what awaits you on your hard drive as you walk among your files and folders.  Simply walk through the portals to view the contents of your file system.  Sometimes, users may not have permission to view certain folders. These folders turn red when you walk into them to let you know you cannot access them.

How It Works

FoldWalker starts you out in a 3D room containing portals to any supported top-level storage medium that it supports, including hard drives, network mapped drives, and much more coming soon!

Features
  • Walk through files and folders
  • Enter C: drive and other local mapped drives
Planned Features (Ordered by Priority)
  • Platforms
    • Linux
    • MacOS
  • File operations
    • Copy
    • Cut
    • Paste
    • Drag & Drop
  • Previews
    • Preview Text
    • Thumbnail images
    • Autoplay videos
  • Entities
    • Enemies (Turn files removed by antivirus into enemies that come to get you)
  • Storage Mediums
    • Network Drives
    • FTP Servers
  • Multiplayer
    • Serve your files
    • Join a server's world
  • World Types
    • Interconnected Rooms
